programme.desc: Ακολουθήστε τα καλύτερα event και τους καλύτερους αθλητές στο kiteboarding, από τα πιο όμορφα σημεία του βόρειου και νότιου ημισφαιρίου!

programme.title: Sports Classics: 2024 Sports Rundown
programme.desc: Ένα συναρπαστικό ταξίδι σε αρένες, γήπεδα, γυμναστήρια και χώρους σε όλο τον κόσμο, όπου αντηχούν οι παλμοί της καρδιάς των αθλημάτων. Οι αθλητές βάζουν τα πάντα σε κάθε άθλημα, αλλά έχετε αναρωτηθεί ποτέ για το άτομο που κρύβεται πίσω από τον αθλητή;.

programme.title: Υδάτινα Σπορ: Ο Κόσμος της Ιστιοπλοΐας 2024
programme.desc: Η εκπομπή παρουσιάζει την καρδιά της ιστιοπλοΐας, από την κομψότητα και το πρεστίζ των εκπληκτικών γιοτ μέχρι την αντοχή που χρειάζεται στους αγώνες και τον σκληρό κόσμο των αγώνων dinghy και του kite surfing.

programme.title: Premier Padel Tour 2024 - Στιγμιότυπα
programme.desc: Το Premier Padel είναι η μόνη διοργάνωση που προσφέρει επίσημους πόντους κατάταξης στους παίκτες και τα τουρνουά P1 απονέμουν στους νικητές 1000 πόντους κι ένα μεγάλο χρηματικό έπαθλο.

programme.title: A '90s Christmas
programme.desc: A workaholic lawyer destined to spend Christmas alone is transported back to 1999 after an unexpected run in with a particularly wise ride-share driver.

programme.title: Deck the Walls
programme.desc: Interior designer, Rose DeMonte, uses her skills back in her hometown to renovate a Christmas Charity Home for her brother Sal and his contractor Brysen's home flipping company.

programme.title: 'Tis the Season to Be Irish
programme.desc: Rose tries to flip a house in Ireland but is blocked by Sean, a handsome local who wants to preserve the historic cottage.

programme.title: An Unexpected Christmas
programme.desc: A speech writer makes a deal with his ex-girlfriend to pretend they are a couple to save his family's Christmas. It's not long before both the ruse and their feelings catch up with them.

programme.title: Never Been Chris'd
programme.desc: Home for the holidays, BFFs Naomi and Liz reconnect with high school crush Chris Silver. A complex love triangle forms, forcing them to take stock of their lives and find the value of friendship.

programme.title: Undercover Holiday
programme.desc: Returning home for the holidays, pop star Jaylen tells her protective family that Matt is her new beau, when in reality, he's her overzealous security guard.

programme.title: Sealed With a List
programme.desc: This holiday season, festive Carley sets out to conquer her list of abandoned resolutions from last year. Aided by co-worker Wyatt, she finds love and the confidence to chase her dreams.

programme.title: My Christmas Family Tree
programme.desc: A woman meets long-lost relatives for the first time after discovering her family tree during the holidays.

programme.title: My Christmas Dream
programme.desc: A department store manager sets out to create an amazing holiday display window to impress the owner. She asks a recently-fired employee to help her make the display, and as they work together, they start to fall in love.

programme.title: Operation Nutcracker
programme.desc: When an antique nutcracker set to be auctioned at the Warby family Christmas charity goes missing, a demanding event planner and the heir to the Warby dynasty try to track it down.

programme.title: Christmas at the Plaza
programme.desc: When historian Jessica is hired to create the Plaza's Christmas display, she finds more than facts while teaming up with handsome decorator Nick to bring the display to life.

programme.title: Three Wiser Men and a Boy
programme.desc: The Brenner brothers are back and putting on a holiday pageant for young Thomas, while trying to cope with life's curveballs, including their mom's new boyfriend.

programme.title: Holiday Touchdown: A Chiefs Love Story
programme.desc: Chiefs superfan Alana tries to win the Fan of the Year Award as a Christmas gift for her family, falling in love with someone in the Chiefs front office along the way.

programme.title: The Nine Lives of Christmas
programme.desc: As the Christmas holiday draws near, a veterinary student (Kimberly Sustad) and a stray cat challenge a fireman's (Brandon Routh) commitment to life as a bachelor.

programme.title: The Finnish Line
programme.desc: Anya, inspired by her father's legacy, competes in Finland's Joulurauha race. Partnered with a new dog, she faces challenges, her father's rival, and her own anxieties.

programme.title: My Norwegian Holiday
programme.desc: A grieving woman forges a deep connection with a Norwegian man when he discovers she has a troll figurine from his hometown. She soon agrees to accompany him to Norway to uncover the troll's origins and find her own path to healing, love and family.

programme.title: Flipping for Christmas
programme.desc: It's almost Christmas when busy realtor Abigail agrees to help her sister with the simple flip of a recently inherited home. Unfortunately, co-beneficiary Bo has other plans in mind.

programme.title: The Royal Nanny
programme.desc: Working under cover as a nanny, an MI5 agent must resist the charms of Prince Colin while keeping the royal family safe during Christmastime.

programme.title: Christmas in Notting Hill
programme.desc: Always too busy for love, famous soccer star Graham Savoy soon has a change of heart when he meets a visiting American during Christmastime.

programme.title: The Christmas Contest
programme.desc: Sparks fly between a former couple as they compete in a Christmas contest to win money for the charity of their choosing.

programme.title: The Nine Kittens of Christmas
programme.desc: Cat lovers Zachary and Marilee are thrown back together at Christmastime when they're tasked with finding homes for a litter of adorable kittens.

programme.title: You, Me & the Christmas Trees
programme.desc: An arborist falls in love with a farmer as she tries to save his trees before the town tree lighting.

programme.title: Picture a Perfect Christmas
programme.desc: A photographer returns home to take care of her grandmother and gets involved with helping a neighbor look after his young nephew.

programme.title: Crown for Christmas
programme.desc: After getting fired from her job as a maid at a ritzy New York City hotel, a woman accepts a temporary job as governess to a young girl who is part of a powerful European family.

programme.title: Sugarplummed
programme.desc: When Emily wishes for a perfect Christmas like the ones found in the popular Sugarplum movies, she's shocked when Sugarplum herself appears to help her fulfill it.

programme.title: Hanukkah on the Rocks
programme.desc: Just one week before Hanukkah, corporate lawyer Tory is unemployed and questioning what's next. As she helps her Bubby prepare for the holiday, she embarks on a quest across Chicago to find Hanukka candles.

programme.title: A Godwink Christmas: Second Chance, First Love
programme.desc: After 15 years, a single father moves home from Hawaii with his two sons and, through a series of coincidences -- or Godwinks, ends up stuck in traffic next to his high school sweetheart.

programme.title: Long Lost Christmas
programme.desc: Hayley is an interior designer who plans to surprise her recently widowed mother with the perfect holiday present -- the extended family she knows her mom yearns for.

programme.title: Christmas Under the Lights
programme.desc: Emily reluctantly returns home to her family's rescue ranch to organize the Christmas Carnival and works with a handsome artist to honor her mother.

programme.title: Christmas in Angel Falls
programme.desc: Guardian angel Gabby is sent to the town of Angel Falls to restore its Christmas spirit. As she helps the townspeople to revive their traditions, Gabby meets a volunteer fire chief who teaches her the truth about the love she admires from afar.

programme.title: Ms. Christmas Comes to Town
programme.desc: After receiving a terminal diagnosis, a shopping channel host known as Ms. Christmas embarks on a multi-city excursion to spread holiday cheer before her farewell broadcast.

programme.title: Christmas in Evergreen: Bells Are Ringing
programme.desc: As Michelle's wedding approaches, Hannah steps up to finish the new Evergreen museum's launch while questioning her future with Elliot.

programme.title: 'Twas the Night Before Christmas
programme.desc: A former actress takes charge of a town's annual Christmas Eve courtroom production, in which the true authorship of the famous poem "A Visit From St. Nick" is debated.

programme.title: One December Night
programme.desc: Two music managers must put their history aside to oversee the televised reunion performance of their rock star fathers with a fractured past.

programme.title: Christmas Tree Lane
programme.desc: When music store owner Meg spearheads community efforts to save her street from demolition, she is shocked to find out that the man she's falling for is working for the company that she is fighting.

programme.title: The Christmas Promise
programme.desc: Nicole learns to deal with grief, with the help of her grandfather and a carpenter she hires to renovate the home that was once meant for her and her fiancé.

programme.title: Time for Me to Come Home for Christmas
programme.desc: Two strangers, a businesswoman and a country music star, are both booked on a flight to Tulsa before the holidays, but it ends up getting canceled due to a snowstorm. They decide to try to get to Tulsa together, and share their secrets along the way.

programme.title: A Christmas Melody
programme.desc: A single mother moves back to her hometown with her young daughter. Having a hard time adjusting, the daughter seeks help from her music teacher to write a song for the Christmas variety show.

programme.title: A Homecoming for the Holidays
programme.desc: Country singer Charlotte is home for the holidays and works with her brother's friend to build a house for a friend in town.

programme.title: All I Need for Christmas
programme.desc: A singer and an entrepreneur spar over their views on music apps.

programme.title: A Dance in the Snow
programme.desc: Melanie wants to create an inclusive Christmas dance for her daughter Jenny, not realizing Jenny is planning a dance of her own to honor Melanie.

programme.title: A Dance in the Snow
programme.desc: Melanie wants to create an inclusive Christmas dance for her daughter Jenny, not realizing Jenny is planning a dance of her own to honor Melanie.

programme.title: A Dream of Christmas
programme.desc: An ambitious married woman gets more than she bargained for when her wish to be single again is granted. She awakens to discover she's got everything she's ever wanted, except her husband. She resolves to find him a second time.

programme.title: Christmas in My Heart
programme.desc: Violinist Beth returns home after the recent death of her mother and tutors the daughter of a reclusive country music star to prepare her for the upcoming holiday concert.

programme.title: Christmas Bells Are Ringing
programme.desc: Samantha, a freelance photographer, is returning to Cape Cod for the first time since the death of her mother years earlier. Having never been to the Cape during winter, she finds that it is a whole new experience than her many summers spent there.

programme.title: Christmas in Homestead
programme.desc: An actress heads to the Christmas-obsessed town of Homestead, Iowa, to shoot a holiday-themed movie. She is shocked when a romance blooms with Matt, a single dad. As she gets a taste of small-town life, she discovers the true meaning of Christmas.

programme.title: A Bramble House Christmas
programme.desc: While settling his father's estate, a man becomes suspicious as to why the man left his nurse a large sum of money after knowing her for less than two months before he died.

programme.title: Romance at Reindeer Lodge
programme.desc: Molly and Jared have both sworn off holiday events. When they find themselves stuck at a Christmas-themed ranch, they have no choice but to allow their cynical hearts to melt.

programme.title: A Christmas to Remember
programme.desc: A TV personality drives to a small-town mountain retreat. On her way, a blizzard veers her off the road and she crashes. When she awakens, she has complete amnesia, and a friendly passerby takes her in.

programme.title: A Christmas Tree Grows in Colorado
programme.desc: A woman who is in charge of her town's Christmas celebration must win over a firefighter to obtain a magnificent spruce tree from his property for the festivities.

programme.title: A Godwink Christmas: Meant for Love
programme.desc: A chance meeting at a weekend wedding celebration brings together Alice and Jack, two singles from very different family backgrounds.

programme.title: A Glenbrooke Christmas
programme.desc: As Christmas nears, heiress Jessica Morgan seizes what seems like her last chance to experience a relaxed Christmas and heads off to the small town of Glenbrooke, where she meets a handsome fireman.

programme.title: To All a Good Night
programme.desc: A small-town photographer saves the life of a mysterious man who may just be here to buy her family's parkland.

programme.title: Last Night in Soho
programme.desc: Eloise, an aspiring fashion designer, is mysteriously able to enter the 1960s, where she encounters a dazzling wannabe singer called Sandie. The glamour is not all it appears to be, however, and the dreams of the past start to become far darker.

programme.title: Fall
programme.desc: Stranded 2,000 feet at the top of a remote, abandoned radio tower, two expert climbers are put to the ultimate test as they desperately fight to survive the elements, a lack of supplies, and vertigo-inducing heights.

programme.desc: Od 1948. godine bugarski klubovi bore se za titulu najboljeg u zemlji. Trenutno u ligi nastupa 14 klubova, koji se bore za prvo mesto i nastup u kvalifikacijama Lige šampiona.

programme.title: Mini-fudbal Socca SP: za 3. mesto: Croatia - Romania
programme.desc: Pratite uzbudljive utakmice i ove varijante najvažnije sporedne stvari na svetu. Uživajte u malom fudbalu uz Socca svetsko prvenstvo!

programme.title: Mini-fudbal Socca SP: Finale: Kazakhstan - Oman
programme.desc: Pratite uzbudljive utakmice i ove varijante najvažnije sporedne stvari na svetu. Uživajte u malom fudbalu uz Socca svetsko prvenstvo!

programme.title: Fudbal - Bundesliga: Wolfsburg - Mainz
programme.desc: Fudbalska Bundesliga najviši je rang takmičenje u Nemačkoj koja od 1963. godine i svog osnutka visokom kvalitetom igre oduševljava sve fudbalske poklonike širom sveta.

programme.title: Rivalitet legendi
programme.desc: Vukli su jedni druge napred, uvek je neki rivalitet izdizao sport na lestvicu više. Najbolji sportisti svih vremena, iz svih sportova.

programme.title: Profi boks: (Wembley Arena) Magnificent 7 III
programme.desc: Roki Marčano, Majk Tajson, Šugar Rej Robinson, Muhamed Ali, Džo Luis. Treba li još koji razlog više da bi pratili ovu plemenitu borilačku veštinu? Prve tragove boksa nalazimo već u trećem veku pre...

programme.title: Košarka - Eurocup: Gran Canaria - Budućnost
programme.desc: Drugo po težini takmičenje u evropskoj klubskoj košarci sigurno zavređuje pažnju ljubitelja košarke. Iako je pomalo u senci Evrolige, Evrokup nudi obilje iznenađenja i kvalitetne košarke.

programme.title: Ekstremni svet sporta
programme.desc: Sve o ekstremnim sportovima, takmičenjima u izdržljivosti i istinskim takmičarskim maratonima. Ovi ljudi svaki dan pomeraju granice onoga što je moguće.

programme.title: Fast Zone
programme.desc: U ovoj emisiji, videćemo šta se dešava na serijama koje ne prenosi Sport Klub. I ovde ima kvalitetnih i ambicioznih vozača koji žele da se probiju u sam vrh.

programme.title: Rally: Dubai Baja: Pregled
programme.desc: Pratite Dubai International Baja, napeto svetsko takmičenje u reliju koje se održava u mondenom Dubaiju.

programme.title: Mountain Bike - The Purpose
programme.desc: Dokumentarni film prati grupu ljudi koji posvećeno treniraju kako bi ostvarili što bolji rezultat u adrenalinskoj trci punoj izazova. Saznajte šta motiviše ove bicikliste da istraju i u najtežim...

programme.title: Košarka - Španska liga: Valencia - Tenerife
programme.desc: Španska košarkaška ACB liga osnovana je 1957. godine kao "Liga National". U ligi sudeluje 18 ekipa prema dvokružnom sistemu takmičenja. (LIVE).

programme.title: Omaž zvezdama
programme.desc: Bokseri, fudbaleri, košarkaši... Najbolji sportisti svih vremena, iz svih sportova. Na istom mestu, u isto vreme, kako ih uporediti i kako napraviti večne liste.

programme.title: Fudbal - Bundesliga 2: Hertha - Munster
programme.desc: Popularna "Cvajta" čini se, nikada nije bila jača. Ko će se od velikana vratiti u prvu ligu? Mesta je malo a kandidata mnogo.

programme.title: Fudbal - Bugarski kup: 1/8 Finala: Lokomotiv Mezdra - Botev Vratsa
programme.desc: Kup Bugarske u fudbalu održava se još od 1938. godine. U takmičenju učestvuju svi zvanično registrovani klubovi, sve utakmice se igraju na sistem eliminacija, sve do polufinala kada se igraju i...
